reception_desk.name: reception desk
reception_desk.description: A long, sturdy desk where visitors check in. Papers, pens, and a computer terminal are neatly arranged on its surface.

games_area.name: games area
games_area.description: An area with several carnival games. One 'Test-Your-Strength' high-striker game has a flickering, sparking generator attached to it.

prize_bull_pen.name: prize bull pen
prize_bull_pen.description: A sturdy pen holding a massive, irritable-looking prize bull. The enclosure is made of a connected metal fence.

food_stall.name: food stall
food_stall.description: A large, semi-permanent food stall. It's a hive of activity, with industrial deep fryers bubbling and several large propane tanks connected to grills.

photo_booth.name: photo booth
photo_booth.description: An automated photo booth. For a small price, it offers a strip of four photos. There's a discarded, blurry photo in the collection tray.

picnic_tables.name: picnic tables
picnic_tables.description: A group of wooden picnic tables, some with ketchup stains.

waiting_room_chairs.name: waiting room chairs
waiting_room_chairs.description: A row of uncomfortable-looking plastic chairs, bolted together. They show signs of heavy use.
waiting_room_chairs.on_break_success_message: With a loud crack, you shatter one of the plastic chairs, sending sharp fragments skittering across the floor.

medical_cots.name: medical cots
medical_cots.description: A row of portable medical cots, each with a thin mattress and a folded blanket.

first_aid_supply_cabinet.name: first aid supply cabinet
first_aid_supply_cabinet.description: A wall-mounted cabinet stocked with basic medical supplies and bandages.

game_stalls.name: game stalls
game_stalls.description: A row of colorful carnival game stalls, each offering a different challenge and cheap prizes.

food_carts.name: food carts
food_carts.description: Mobile food carts serving snacks, drinks, and carnival treats.

plastic_chairs.name: plastic chairs
plastic_chairs.description: A set of cheap, stackable plastic chairs. They look flimsy.

emergency_case.name: emergency case
emergency_case.description: A red emergency case mounted on the wall with 'In Case of Emergency' written on it.
emergency_case.on_break_success_message: With a final, shattering crack, the glass front of the emergency case breaks open!

low_table.name: low table
low_table.description: A simple, low table in the waiting area, covered in old magazines.

hospital_bed.name: hospital bed
hospital_bed.description: A standard, adjustable hospital bed with metal railings.

bedside_table.name: bedside table
bedside_table.description: A small table next to the hospital bed, with a drawer.

metal_shelves.name: metal shelves
metal_shelves.description: Tall, industrial metal shelves, stocked with various supplies.

information_kiosk_unattended.name: information kiosk (unattended)
information_kiosk_unattended.description: An empty information kiosk. A few pamphlets are scattered on the counter.

wooden_pews.name: wooden pews
wooden_pews.description: Long wooden benches arranged in rows, facing an altar.

elevator_call_panel.name: elevator call panel
elevator_call_panel.description: The control panel to call the elevator. It has a key card slot.

use_item_interaction.message_success: You swipe the {item_name}. The elevator call button lights up, and the doors hiss open, revealing access to the Upper Floor.
use_item_interaction.message_fail_item: This key card doesn't seem to grant access to the upper floors via this elevator.

icu_bed_controls.name: ICU bed controls
icu_bed_controls.description: A control panel for adjusting the position and settings of the ICU bed.

medical_supply_cart.name: medical supply cart
medical_supply_cart.description: A wheeled cart with drawers and shelves, stocked with medical supplies.

filing_cabinets.name: filing cabinets
filing_cabinets.description: Standard-issue metal filing cabinets filled with patient records.

records_shelves.name: records shelves
records_shelves.description: Shelves overflowing with patient records and binders.

computer terminal desk.name: computer terminal desk
computer terminal desk.description: A dusty desk with an old CRT monitor and keyboard.

control_desk.name: control desk
control_desk.description: A large desk with multiple monitors and a complex control panel for the MRI machine.

use_item_interaction.message_success: You swipe the radiology key card through a card reader on the control desk. Lights on the console flash, and you hear the MRI machine in the next room hum to life with a powerful surge!
use_item_interaction.message_fail_item: That key card doesn't seem to do anything with the control desk for activation.

use_item_interaction.message_success: You swipe the medical director key card through a card reader on the control desk. Lights on the console flash, and you hear the MRI machine in the next room hum to life with a powerful surge!
use_item_interaction.message_fail_item: That key card doesn't seem to do anything with the control desk for activation.

use_item_interaction.message_success: You swipe the radiology key card. The MRI machine whines down, and the intense magnetic field subsides. Emergency shutdown initiated.
use_item_interaction.message_fail_item: This key card cannot deactivate the MRI with the control desk.
use_item_interaction.message_fail_mri_state: The MRI is in a state that cannot be remotely deactivated with this key card right now! It's too unstable or already off.

use_item_interaction.message_success: You swipe the medical director key card. The MRI machine whines down, and the intense magnetic field subsides. Emergency shutdown initiated.
use_item_interaction.message_fail_item: This key card cannot deactivate the MRI with the control desk.
use_item_interaction.message_fail_mri_state: The MRI is in a state that cannot be remotely deactivated with this key card right now! It's too unstable or already off.

equipment_cart.name: equipment cart
equipment_cart.description: A wheeled cart loaded with various medical equipment and supplies.
equipment_cart.examine_details: This cart holds a variety of medical tools: syringes, bandages, antiseptics, and more. It looks like it was used for emergency care. The top has several organized compartments and drawers.

use_result.medical_emergency: The cart provides easy access to medical supplies for emergency care.
use_result.mobile_workspace: You can wheel the cart to wherever you need the medical supplies.

mahogany_desk.name: Mahogany Desk
mahogany_desk.description: A large, impressive desk. Its drawers are likely locked. There are strange carvings on its surface.

revolving_door.name: revolving door
revolving_door.description: The main revolving door for the hospital entrance. It seems to be the only way out.

bookshelves.name: bookshelves
bookshelves.description: Tall wooden bookshelves filled with various medical texts and journals.

morgue_drawers.name: morgue drawers
morgue_drawers.description: Rows of cold, metal drawers for storing bodies.

examination_table.name: examination table
examination_table.description: A metal table used for autopsies and examinations.

broken_rocking_chair.name: broken rocking chair
broken_rocking_chair.description: A splintered rocking chair, its motion silenced forever.

crate.name: crate
crate.description: A sturdy wooden crate, nailed shut.

stack_of_old_boxes.name: stack of old boxes
stack_of_old_boxes.description: A teetering stack of dusty cardboard boxes.

old_trunk.name: old trunk
old_trunk.description: A heavy, dust-covered trunk with iron bands.

hallway_mirror.name: Hallway Mirror
hallway_mirror.description: A tall, clear mirror in a gilt frame.
hallway_mirror.examine_details: Your reflection stares back at you, unblinking.

dusty_table.name: dusty table
dusty_table.description: A small table covered in a thick layer of dust.

single_bed.name: single bed
single_bed.description: A small bed with a thin, stained mattress.

cluttered_desk.name: cluttered desk
cluttered_desk.description: A desk covered in papers and books.

kitchen_counter.name: kitchen counter
kitchen_counter.description: A long kitchen counter with a sink.

shelves.name: shelves
shelves.description: A set of wooden shelves on the wall.

fireplace.name: fireplace
fireplace.description: A brick fireplace, filled with ash. One brick looks slightly loose.

fireplace_cavity.name: fireplace cavity
fireplace_cavity.description: A small, hidden cavity behind a loose brick in the fireplace.

workbench.name: workbench
workbench.description: A sturdy workbench cluttered with tools.

nightstand.name: nightstand
nightstand.description: A small nightstand next to the bed.

dresser.name: dresser
dresser.description: A wooden dresser with several drawers.

ticket_booth.name: ticket booth
ticket_booth.description: A small booth for selling tickets.
ticket_booth.on_break_success_message: You smash the ticket booth open.
